title: Canberra .NET User Group: I have a container... now what? - Thiago Passos
thumbnailDescription: Canberra .NET User Group: I have a container... now what? - Thiago Passos
eventShortDescription:
I have a container... now what? - Thiago Passos

This is not the same container 101 talk you’ve seen a dozen times. The point of this talk is how to ship a container to production, once you’ve built it.
 
We’ll containerize a .net core app, debug locally, set up continuous deployment, set up a container cluster and deploy to it.

​
